page.title: 03HENSINGHAM VILLAGE STUDY.
page.content: Hensingham is a village two miles outside Whitehaven.There are council estates and private houses.There are five schools in or near the village: two juniors,one infant,and two secondary schools.For a small village there are a lot of pubs,betting shops, small corner shops,a sub-post office,a hairdressers,fish & chip shops etc.West Cumberland Hospital,the largest hospital in the area,is nearby.It has a helicopter landing pad which is used when emergency cases are transferred to Newcastle.The A.595 ,a busy road,runs through the village. There are several Churches,the largest being St.John's Church.There are children's play areas near our junior school and a new swimming pool is being built nearby to serve the Whitehaven area.
